SEARCH
Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.bean

Class MailBean

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.bean.MailBean
@ApplicationScoped public class MailBean extends Object
The MailBean class is responsible for managing MailEntity instances. It is an application scoped bean, meaning there is a single instance for the entire application.

  • Method Details

    • createDefaultMailsIfNotExistent

      public void createDefaultMailsIfNotExistent()
      Creates default mails if they do not exist. This method is used for testing purposes. It creates 30 mails from user 1 to user 2 and 30 mails from user 2 to user 1.

    • getMailsReceivedBySessionId

      public List<MailDto> getMailsReceivedBySessionId(String sessionId, int page, int pageSize, boolean unread)
      Returns a list of mails received by the user with the given session id.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the session id of the user
      page - the page number
      pageSize - the number of mails per page
      unread - if true, only unread mails are returned
      Returns:
      a list of MailDto objects

    • getTotalMailsReceivedBySessionId

      public int getTotalMailsReceivedBySessionId(String sessionId, boolean unread)
      Returns the total number of mails received by the user with the given session id.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the session id of the user
      unread - if true, only unread mails are counted
      Returns:
      the total number of mails received by the user

    • markMailAsSeen

      public boolean markMailAsSeen(String sessionId, int mailId)
      Marks a mail as seen.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the session id of the user
      mailId - the id of the mail
      Returns:
      true if the mail was marked as seen, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      userSender - the user who sends the mail
      mailDto - the mail to be sent
      Returns:
      true if the mail was sent, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the total number of mails sent by the user

    • getMailsSentBySessionId

      public List<MailDto> getMailsSentBySessionId(String sessionId, int page, int pageSize)
      Retrieves a list of mails sent by the user identified by the given session ID. This method paginates the results based on the provided page number and page size.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user whose sent mails are to be retrieved. This is used to identify the user within the system.
      page - The page number of the result set to retrieve. This is used for pagination.
      pageSize - The number of mail items to retrieve per page. This is used for pagination.
      Returns:
      A list of MailDto objects representing the mails sent by the user. Each MailDto contains details of a single mail, including sender and receiver information, subject, text, and status flags such as whether the mail has been seen, or deleted by the sender or receiver.

    • getTotalMailsSentBySessionId

      public int getTotalMailsSentBySessionId(String sessionId)
      Retrieves the total number of mails sent by the user identified by the given session ID.

      sessionId -
      Returns:
